comment:
* Builder class for producing complex elements with matching field and name
     * pairs.  The builder starts empty.  The order in which elements are added
     * is retained for the layout in memory.
     *

methods.name: public Builder add(Element element, String name, int arraySize)
methods.comment:
* Add an array of elements to this element.
         *
         * @param element
         * @param name
         * @param arraySize

methods.name: public Builder add(Element element, String name)
methods.comment:
* Add a single element to this Element.
         *
         * @param element
         * @param name

methods.name: public Element create()
methods.comment:
* Create the element from this builder.
         *
         *
         * @return Element

methodNames: public Builder add(Element element, String name, int arraySize)
public Builder add(Element element, String name)
